channel.title: Halo 2 recreation with pics
channel.description:
i will be remaking halo 2 blood gultch i will have the following items snipers handguns needlers green red blue and silver arnour you can drive you wont be able to fly a banachie you can fly whatever the mini wans are flame thrower rocket launcher im ganna build the bases but but heres the thing im ganna make teleports so that you can play free for all caoture the flag team slayer and more to come..... :D pics
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/30swtix.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/345oc5i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2d6wxg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/2vcfg9u.jpg[/img]

item.title: Halo 2 recreation with pics
item.dc:creator: @linkey linkey
item.description:
@linkey wrote:

This again - looks extremely simple. Use some RuneScape based coding such as Castle Wars areas, Clan Wars and other mini-games. Edit the cache to look different and design some other textures to the ground. Create custom objects: client based, add those custom items: client based, and possibly add special attacks for the items. You are going to need alot more work put into your backround screen. So far it looks horrible, although the idea sounds great if it were to be actually done.

Read full topic

item.title: Halo 2 recreation with pics
item.dc:creator: @supra_s supra s
item.description:
@supra_s wrote:

On another topic

wtf…

  1. We don’t make posts that contain not useful information. Posts like “cool”, “lol”, “yeah” and “I agree” don’t contain anything useful for others. We are not fans of off topic, unless it contains something smart or funny. Most of things spammers find funny are actually not funny at all.

Read full topic

item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

Fat Cookies:

The way that you put that post it seems that your Gs Pk Pure. If true, your ban evading and should be banned. Can a mod please check IPs

Excuse me! I’m not Gs Pk Pure… He is my friend and he lives like 2 door’s down from me, He is the person who got me introduced to moparscape, So trace the ip adress for all i care…I’m not Gs Pk Pure and i do not try to be, He is just a friend…

item.title: Halo 2 recreation with pics
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

[quote=“mad_moparscapian, post:9, topic:273217”][quote author=Fat Cookies link=topic=360591.msg2747257#msg2747257 date=1239704084]
Your “Woot Woot” Login box looks horrible. gs pk pure is already doing the exact same thing but I dont think he is working on the project anymore
[/quote]

About that… Gs Pk Pure was banned…So No he is not working on this project anymore… However, He is still working on a project That will be released i am aware of this and the Rumor that My good friend… Gs Pk Pure had died is NOT true

The rumor was started when i was abroad in lanzorote… I had told a friend my password so that he could update my development thread … Runescape RSPS However he abused this privelage and posted a thread on Moparisthebest.org That gs pk pure had passed on.

I hope this helped you realize the truth and that rumor’s can hurt people

If you would like to contact Gs Pk Pure please add this msn.

Gs_Pk_Pure@project-velocity.co.uk

Great!

And tbh this is stupid the amount of projects that are forgoten that are stupid not to mention thoose ‘custom wepons’ have been made to many times. Im not saying yours is im basically saying this isn’t a uniqe thing.

Read full topic
